title: Trump Tariffs Cost U.S. Families $1,000
summary:
With wealth inequality hitting French Revolution levels, the U.S. economy may be at its breaking point. Scott Galloway and Jessica Tarlov discuss, on Raging Moderates.
#trump #economy #politics
